name: inFAMOUS Collection
description:
Take the role of an accidental hero who has been granted extraordinary abilities. From his unexpected origins to the explosive finale, evolve your powers to fulfill your destiny. Will you defeat the evil that awaits you, or will you bring about the destruction of the world? The choice is yours.

Includes:
o inFAMOUS™
o inFAMOUS 2™
o inFAMOUS™: Festival of Blood
o Extra missions
o Additional character costumes, power ups and weapon styles
This item is being licensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation® devices associated with this Sony Entertainment Network Account. Developed by Sucker Punch Productions LLC.
